T02D3784:223b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3784:223b-5: 'jam pa'i dpal dang 'jig rten mgon po rgyal ba mchog gi cod pan dang ni dzambha la //
T02D3784:223b-6: rdor sems byams pa phyag na rdo rje lag na autpal bzang skyong dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D3784:223b-7: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sa gsum phyag rgyas nyes pa ma lus zad gyur pa //
T02D3784:223b-8: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224a-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyugs bdag 'dul byed rdo rje dril bu padma'i lag pa can dang @224a * //
T02D3784:224a-2: / ha l'a ha l'a ser po dag dang dgra yi tshogs 'joms dakki'i rgyal po bdag nyid che //
T02D3784:224a-3: mi bskyod pa dang spos kyi glang po rin chen tog dang rab 'jigs mi g-yog shin rje'i dgra //
T02D3784:224a-4: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224a-5: yon tan tshogs mnga' byang chub sems kyis sems brgyan dge 'dun 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas dang //
T02D3784:224a-6: dga' ba rab grub sangs rgyas rtsod pa'i dri ma las rgyal he ru ka dang dbyig sngon can //
T02D3784:224a-7: sangs rgyas s'a la'i dbang po rgyal po rgyal ba'i yon rigs sems can kun la rjes brtse ba //
T02D3784:224a-8: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224a-9: shes rab skul byed sgrol ma dag dang ye shes tshogs ni bsags par gyur pa'i khro gnyer can //
T02D3784:224a-10: bdud kyi bdud gyur 'od zer can ma zhal gsum mdog ser 'jigs pa mtha' dag rab 'joms ma //
T02D3784:224a-11: rma bya chen mo m'a ma k'i dang dgra yi tshogs 'joms gos dkar mo dang sangs rgyas spyan //
T02D3784:224a-12: dgyes ma rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224a-13: gandha ri dang lag na ltos 'gro zhags pa lcags kyu ral gri 'dzin byed dug sel ma //
T02D3784:224a-14: rdo rje lag pa ma dang phag mo dgra sta ral gri 'dzin byed chos kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02D3784:224a-15: bde mchog las byung ye shes dpa' bo dpung rgyan phyag drug rgyal mtshan rab tu 'chang byed pa //
T02D3784:224a-16: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224a-17: rgyal ba mchod byed pi wang phreng ma glu ma dang ni ri khrod bdug spos rdo rje ma //
T02D3784:224a-18: ro langs mar me dri yi rdo rje rab tu bzhad gdong bde 'gro dag dang mi pham ma //
T02D3784:224a-19: sangs rgyas byang chub dpal mo dang ni rgyal ba mtha' dag mnyes par byed pa'i dbyangs can ma ;
T02D3784:224a-20: / dgyes ma rnams kyis dri med yid bde don
T02D3784:224a-21: kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol
T02D3784:224a-22: // rgyal ba mchog gis chos 'khor bskor gyur yangs
T02D3784:224a-23: pa can dang bya rgod phung po'i ri bo dang
T02D3784:224a-24: // // lum bi ni dang mnyan yod dang ni
T02D3784:224b-0: sa yi steng gnas ko ka med dang byang @224b
T02D3784:224b-1: // // chub shing // dpal gyi be'u dang aa
T02D3784:224b-2: shad 'dab ma zhol 'bras me tog dpal 'bras dung
T02D3784:224b-4: dgyes pa rnams kyi dri med yid de don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224b-5: gdugs dang d'ur ba padma dang ni rgyal mtshan dag dang nya dang bi wang sil snyan 'dzin //
T02D3784:224b-6: pheg pa dag dang rab gang bum pa thub pa gsung mchog rdo rje dril bu'i sgra dang ni //
T02D3784:224b-7: sangs rgyas cho 'phrul 'jo sgeg bzhad 'gros rnam par rol pa lha dang mi yis phyag byas pa //
T02D3784:224b-8: dgyes pa rnams kyis dri med yid bde don kun grub pa'i bkra shis khyod la stsal du gsol //
T02D3784:224b-9: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol mas gsungs pa'i bkra shis brgyad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3784:224b-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi na ya shr'i mi tra dang /
